creator: info@dvholten.de
text:
using the zip-task i can create zip-archives. when i check a ant-zip-archive created this way using winzip, i can see that the root of a path is sometimes written 'correct' and sometimes written lowercase only. it seems to depend on the upper/lower case writing of some lower part of the path.
restoring this could result in serious confusion on win/nt.

example:
path is 'RNP/Bc/SalesProduct.java' , will be seen in WinZip as '/RNP/Bc/SalesProduct.java'.
path is 'RNP/base/GlobalFactory.java', will be seen in WinZip an
'/rnp/base/GlobalFactory.java'.

creator: bodewig@apache.org
text:
Sorry, I can't follow you here. As far as I can tell, Ant will always use
relative paths in the ZIP file.
